dialogue.speaker: Customer
dialogue.text: I need answers now, I don’t have all day.

dialogue.speaker: Agent
dialogue.text: I understand your urgency, Mr. Roberts. Let me check your account.

dialogue.speaker: Customer
dialogue.text: This is taking too long already.

dialogue.speaker: Agent
dialogue.text: I apologize for the delay, I’m working as quickly as I can.

dialogue.speaker: Customer
dialogue.text: Why is this so complicated?

dialogue.speaker: Agent
dialogue.text: I’ll guide you through it step by step.

dialogue.speaker: Customer
dialogue.text: Fine, but hurry up.

dialogue.speaker: Agent
dialogue.text: Of course. Can you confirm your order number for me?

dialogue.speaker: Customer
dialogue.text: It’s in front of you, isn’t it?

dialogue.speaker: Agent
dialogue.text: I need you to confirm for security reasons.

dialogue.speaker: Customer
dialogue.text: Alright. It’s 12345.

dialogue.speaker: Agent
dialogue.text: Thank you. Let me pull up your details now.

dialogue.speaker: Customer
dialogue.text: You should already know this.

dialogue.speaker: Agent
dialogue.text: I want to make sure everything is accurate before proceeding.

dialogue.speaker: Customer
dialogue.text: Whatever. Just fix it.

dialogue.speaker: Agent
dialogue.text: Working on it right now.

dialogue.speaker: Customer
dialogue.text: So what’s the holdup?

dialogue.speaker: Agent
dialogue.text: We’re waiting for system confirmation. Almost done.

dialogue.speaker: Customer
dialogue.text: I don’t want excuses, just results.

dialogue.speaker: Agent
dialogue.text: Understood. I’ll resolve this as soon as possible.

dialogue.speaker: Customer
dialogue.text: Better.
